description: <p><span>An exciting opportunity has arisen to support the gynaecological nursing service within Wye Valley NHS Trust on an interim basis. This post offers opportunities to support both inpatient care and the outpatient department. The applicant will need a good knowledge base on Gynaecological nursing and management experience. The applicant will be involved in gynaecological service improvement and will be responsible for staff development. The role involves the management of clinic optimisation and the admission of urgent and elective patients as required. The role is diverse and a working knowledge of clinical shift leadership, risk & governance, mentor and preceptorship skills, human resource and people management skills and budget management are essential. Requires someone who has recent evidence of practice and exposure in women’s health. The role requires someone who is able to work flexibly and adapt to changing service needs. </span></p>
title: Gynaecological Service Manager
